scripts-info.build_all: Build all packages(ES6, CJS, AMD, Global) and generate packages
scripts-info.build_amd: Build AMD package with clean up existing build, copy source into dist
scripts-info.build_cjs: Build CJS package with clean up existing build, copy source into dist
scripts-info.build_es6: Build ES6 package with clean up existing build, copy source into dist
scripts-info.build_closure_core: Minify Global core build using closure compiler
scripts-info.build_global: Build Global package, then minify build
scripts-info.build_perf: Build CJS & Global build, run macro performance test
scripts-info.build_test: Build CJS package & test spec, execute mocha test runner
scripts-info.build_cover: Run lint to current code, build CJS & test spec, execute test coverage
scripts-info.build_docs: Build ES6 & global package, create documentation using it
scripts-info.clean_spec: Clean up existing test spec build output
scripts-info.clean_dist_amd: Clean up existing AMD package output
scripts-info.clean_dist_cjs: Clean up existing CJS package output
scripts-info.clean_dist_es6: Clean up existing ES6 package output
scripts-info.lint_perf: Run lint against performance test suite
scripts-info.test_mocha: Execute mocha test runner against existing test spec build
scripts-info.test_browser: Execute mocha test runner on browser against existing test spec build
scripts-info.test: Clean up existing test spec build, build test spec and execute mocha test runner
scripts-info.tests2png: Generate marble diagram image from test spec
scripts-info.watch: Watch codebase, trigger compile when source code changes

scripts.build_all: npm-run-all build_es6 build_amd build_cjs build_global generate_packages
scripts.build_global: shx rm -rf ./dist/global && mkdirp ./dist/global && node tools/make-umd-bundle.js && node tools/make-system-bundle.js && npm-run-all build_closure_core
scripts.build_perf: webdriver-manager update && npm-run-all build_cjs build_global perf
scripts.build_test: shx rm -rf ./dist/ && npm-run-all build_cjs clean_spec build_spec test_mocha
scripts.build_cover: shx rm -rf ./dist/ && npm-run-all build_cjs build_spec cover
scripts.build_docs: npm-run-all build_es6_for_docs build_global build_spec tests2png decision_tree_widget && esdoc -c esdoc.json
scripts.cover: shx rm -rf dist/cjs && tsc typings/globals/es6-shim/index.d.ts src/Rx.ts src/add/observable/of.ts -m commonjs --outDir dist/cjs --sourceMap --target ES5 -d && nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=html --exclude=spec/support/**/* --exclude=spec-js/**/* mocha --opts spec/support/default.opts spec-js
scripts.decision_tree_widget: cd doc/decision-tree-widget && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.prepublish: shx rm -rf ./typings && typings install && npm run build_all
scripts.tests2png: npm run build_spec && mkdirp tmp/docs/img && mkdirp spec-js/support && shx cp spec/support/*.opts spec-js/support/ && mocha --opts spec/support/tests2png.opts spec-js
scripts.watch: watch "echo triggering build && npm run build_test && echo build completed" src -d -u -w=15
